[00:00:06 - 00:00:09] in which there was a great concourse of horsemen. (Gender: Male, Emotion: Neutral).

response:
As the boy walked along the street, he couldn't help but notice the commotion ahead. He had been sent by his grandfather with a message to a distant relation, and he was determined to deliver it promptly. He quickened his pace, weaving through the crowd of horsemen who were gathered in the middle of the street.

One of the horsemen, a tall and imposing figure, caught the boy's eye. "Excuse me, young one," the man said, reining in his horse. "What brings you to this place?" The boy explained his mission, and the horseman nodded thoughtfully. "I can take you to your relation," he offered, "but first, let me ask you, have you ever seen such a gathering of horsemen before?"
